aboutUs.title: We are glad to help you crafting your ideas
aboutUs.message: We are a software development company. We offer simple, effective and tailor-made solutions. We are a company run by cutting-edge young people who guarantee quality and innovation in the development of our solutions

whyChoose.title: We give shape to your ideas
whyChoose.innomsg: Latest generation innovative software, just like us ðŸ˜œ
whyChoose.flexmsg: We easily adapt to the requirements of our customers and partners
whyChoose.internmsg: Our software are in Italian, English, Swedish, French and Spanish with the highest linguistic level on the market

services.appText: We can control as many cloud environments as you like, across multiple platforms. We create not only different environments in the same platform, but many environments in different platforms or many applications in one platform. It all depends on your needs and the requirements of your application
services.consultancyText: We offer IT consulting services that will help you improve your software architecture, create a technology-driven digital strategy, and improve operations by optimizing your software tools. Our software engineers will finish your digital transformation journey through careful planning and effective execution of the described IT strategy.
services.cloudText: We are very familiar with Amazon AWS and Microsoft Azure. Our solutions make the most of both services. We help companies define a migration strategy to the Cloud, accompanying them from the assessment phase (with our kickstart path) to the migration phase and finally the optimization phase.
services.translationsText: We not only offer tailor-made websites and applications, but also in different language combinations. Guaranteeing, thanks to our mother tongue specialists, the highest linguistic level on the market. We also offer intensive learning and language refresher courses for you and your employees in English, French, Swedish, Spanish and Italian.
